abstract: Dr. Arnold Kim’s Web site, MacRumors.com, has become such a popular technology site, he has stopped practicing medicine to blog full time.
snippet: Dr. Arnold Kim’s Web site, MacRumors.com, has become such a popular technology site, he has stopped practicing medicine to blog full time.
lead_paragraph: For eight years, Arnold Kim has been trading gossip, rumor and facts about Apple, the notoriously secretive computer company, on his Web site, MacRumors.com.

headline.main: My Son, the Blogger: An M.D. Trades Medicine for Apple Rumors
headline.print_headline: My Son, the Blogger: An M.D. Trades Medicine for Apple Rumors

abstract: Apple says it will have a new product in the coming months, as it warns investors that its profit margins will shrink because of lower prices. What price and what product, however, was shrouded in the usual iMystery.
snippet: Apple says it will have a new product in the coming months, as it warns investors that its profit margins will shrink because of lower prices. What price and what product, however, was shrouded in the usual iMystery.
lead_paragraph: As usual, Apple didn’t offer many specifics on its quarterly conference call with investors. But the company did hint that it has something really juicy to introduce before the end of September.

headline.main: An iTease: Something Cool and Cheap From Apple
